heading.title: Admin Template | Modern Dashboard for Web Apps
heading.description: A clean and responsive admin dashboard template built for modern web apps. Includes reusable UI components, charts, tables, and authentication pages.

card.title: Adaptive themes, instantly available
card.description: Dark, light and system modes keep the experience consistent on every device.
card.body: Switch effortlessly via the ThemeToggle component, while @tanstack/react-query and our HTTP client keep auth states synchronized.
